title: Suspension
body:
I keep getting autofilled every game i get and i cant play these roles
I SUCK AT ADC
BUT I KEEP GETTING IT 
NOW IM BEING FLAMED AND I FLAME THEM BACK BUT IM THE BAD GUY FOR BEING BAD AT THIS ROLE
I JUST GOT SUSPENDED FOR 14 DAYS BECAUSE I MISCLICKED DURING A FIGHT BECUZ I DIDNT WANNA DIE
I have no patience for this game anymore

replies.body: No, you're the "bad guy" for flaming back. You got a suspension for that flame, not for misclicking during a fight.
i was alraedy be x9 before i said a word
Youre not a bad guy, you just keep breaking the rules. Stop doing that. Read the damn rules so you arent so surprised when you break them.
